profileFeatures.title: Profile-Based Features
profileFeatures.description: These features are controlled by Spring profiles and must be activated in the service configuration. Changes require a server restart.

moduleFeatures.title: Module Features
moduleFeatures.description: These features are controlled by module configuration in application-prod.yml. Changes require a server restart.

dynamicToggles.title: Runtime Feature Toggles
dynamicToggles.description: Enable or disable features for all users. Changes take effect immediately without server restart.

iris.name: Iris (AI Assistant)
iris.description: Enables the Iris AI virtual tutor powered by LLMs for personalized student support and code assistance.

athena.name: Athena (AI Assessment)
athena.description: Enables Athena ML-based automated feedback suggestions for text and programming exercises.

theia.name: Theia (Online IDE)
theia.description: Enables the Theia cloud-based IDE for programming exercises, allowing students to code in the browser.

ldap.name: LDAP Authentication
ldap.description: Enables LDAP-based authentication for user login through institutional directory services.

saml2.name: SAML2 Authentication
saml2.description: Enables SAML2-based single sign-on (SSO) authentication through identity providers.

localci.name: Local CI
localci.description: Enables the local continuous integration system for building and testing programming submissions.

buildagent.name: Integrated Build Agent
buildagent.description: Enables the integrated build agent on the server node for Local CI, eliminating the need for separate build agent nodes.

aeolus.name: Aeolus (Build Plans)
aeolus.description: Enables Aeolus for dynamic build plan generation and customization for programming exercises.

jenkins.name: Jenkins CI
jenkins.description: Enables Jenkins as the continuous integration system for programming exercise builds.

atlas.name: Atlas (Adaptive Learning)
atlas.description: Enables competency-based learning features including learning paths, competency tracking, and analytics.

hyperion.name: Hyperion (Exercise Creation)
hyperion.description: Enables AI-assisted exercise creation using Hyperion for generating programming exercises.

exam.name: Exam Mode
exam.description: Enables exam mode for conducting secure online assessments with proctoring features.

plagiarism.name: Plagiarism Detection
plagiarism.description: Enables plagiarism detection using JPlag for text, modeling, and programming exercises.

text.name: Text Exercises
text.description: Enables text exercises with manual and automated assessment capabilities.

modeling.name: Modeling Exercises
modeling.description: Enables UML diagram exercises using the Apollon editor with automatic similarity comparison.

fileupload.name: File Upload Exercises
fileupload.description: Enables file upload exercises for submitting documents, images, and other files.

lecture.name: Lectures
lecture.description: Enables lecture management with units, slides, videos, and attachments.

tutorialgroup.name: Tutorial Groups
tutorialgroup.description: Enables tutorial group management for organizing students and tutors.

nebula.name: Nebula (Video Processing)
nebula.description: Enables lecture video processing and transcription for AI-enhanced content understanding.

sharing.name: Exercise Sharing
sharing.description: Enables sharing and importing of programming exercises between courses and institutions.

lti.name: LTI Integration
lti.description: Enables Learning Tools Interoperability (LTI) for integration with external learning management systems.

apollon.name: Apollon PDF Export
apollon.description: Enables PDF export of UML diagrams via the external Apollon conversion service. Modeling exercises work without this; only the export button is affected.

passkey.name: Passkey Authentication
passkey.description: Enables passwordless authentication using FIDO2/WebAuthn passkeys for enhanced security.

ProgrammingExercises.name: Programming Exercises
ProgrammingExercises.description: Allows instructors to create programming exercises with automatic assessment through CI/CD pipelines.
ProgrammingExercises.disableWarning: Students will not be able to participate in programming exercises. Existing submissions remain accessible.

PlagiarismChecks.name: Plagiarism Detection
PlagiarismChecks.description: Enables plagiarism detection for text, modeling, and programming exercises using JPlag.
PlagiarismChecks.disableWarning: Instructors will not be able to run plagiarism checks on exercises.

Exports.name: Data Exports
Exports.description: Allows exporting course data, exam results, and student submissions.
Exports.disableWarning: Users will not be able to export course or exam data.

LearningPaths.name: Learning Paths
LearningPaths.description: Enables personalized learning paths based on competencies and student progress.
LearningPaths.disableWarning: Students will not see personalized learning path recommendations.

Science.name: Science Data Collection
Science.description: Collects anonymized usage data for research purposes to improve learning outcomes.
Science.disableWarning: No usage data will be collected for research analysis.

StandardizedCompetencies.name: Competency Import
StandardizedCompetencies.description: Allows instructors to import competencies from standardized frameworks (e.g., curricula, qualification profiles) and link them to course competencies for better alignment with educational standards.
StandardizedCompetencies.disableWarning: Instructors will not be able to import or link standardized competencies to their courses.

StudentCourseAnalyticsDashboard.name: Analytics Dashboard
StudentCourseAnalyticsDashboard.description: Provides students with a personal dashboard showing learning progress, performance metrics, exercise statistics, and competency mastery - when enabled by course instructors.
StudentCourseAnalyticsDashboard.disableWarning: Students will not have access to their personal analytics dashboard, even if instructors enable it for their course.

TutorSuggestions.name: AI Tutor Suggestions
TutorSuggestions.description: Uses Iris to suggest answers for tutors when responding to student questions in the communication module.
TutorSuggestions.disableWarning: Tutors will not receive AI-assisted answer suggestions from Iris in the communication module.

AtlasML.name: Atlas Machine Learning
AtlasML.description: Uses machine learning to automatically generate competency recommendations based on course content, predict student performance, and provide intelligent suggestions for learning path optimization.
AtlasML.disableWarning: Automatic competency generation, performance predictions, and ML-based learning recommendations will not be available.

AtlasAgent.name: Atlas Agent
AtlasAgent.description: Enables an AI agent that helps students understand and master competencies by providing personalized explanations, answering questions about learning objectives, and guiding them through their competency-based learning journey.
AtlasAgent.disableWarning: Students will not have access to the AI-powered competency assistant.

Memiris.name: Iris Memory System
Memiris.description: Enables long-term memory for Iris AI assistants, allowing them to remember context from previous conversations and provide more personalized, contextually aware responses over time.
Memiris.disableWarning: Iris will not retain conversation history between sessions, resulting in less personalized AI assistance.

LectureContentProcessing.name: Lecture Video Processing
LectureContentProcessing.description: Uses Nebula to automatically generate transcriptions from lecture videos and sends them to Pyris/Iris, enabling AI assistants to answer questions about lecture content and provide more accurate, content-aware responses.
LectureContentProcessing.disableWarning: Lecture videos will not be transcribed by Nebula and Iris will not be able to reference lecture content in its responses.

RateLimit.name: API Rate Limiting
RateLimit.description: Protects the application from abuse and overload by limiting the number of specific API requests per user within a given time period.
RateLimit.disableWarning: Specific API endpoints are not protected by rate limiting, which can lead to potential abuse or overload.
